common_2100_head_teacher_01: Excellent. It seems everyone is here.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_02:
Some of you will certainly have heard the
happy news.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_03a:
We have a new Champion here at Naranja
Academy![npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_03b: We have a new Champion here at Uva Academy![npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_04:
[BD06:0]Yes, none other than our very own M[aster;iss:g]
[trnm:0]![npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_05:
It gives me great joy to see one of our students
achieve this feat during their time at the academy.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_06:
Today’s tournament was organized by your
student council president, Miss Nemona, in\r
celebration of her friend’s accomplishment.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_07:
I invite all of you here to see for yourselves the
impressive strength of our new Champion.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_08:
Not to mention the talents of those students
claiming the spotlight for the first time today...[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_09:
And, of course, the superb battle prowess and
acumen of our esteemed faculty.[npcn:A]
common_2100_head_teacher_10:
Now, without further ado, let the Academy Ace
Tournament—our School Battle Brawl—begin![npcn:A]
